name: 夜雪冰娇
description: 在末世的寒冷和黑暗中，一个身份特殊的少年，身负异能，为了生存，带着几个同伴，历经磨难，走遍世界各地，寻求击败魔王的方法，追溯万年之前发生的故事，寻找散落世间的宝物...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 930 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound Additional Notes:
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel I7 or better Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 970 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound Additional Notes:
